<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"- Execute a one-time minting of tokens on Shannon based on tokens owned by the given Morse account\n- Credit the minted tokens to the balance of the given Shannon account\n- Migrate unclaimable staked and liquid Morse tokens as liquid Shannon tokens\n\n- MAY ONLY be executed by the authority\n- ONLY intended for use on accounts with invalid addresses and/or known lost private keys\n\nNext free index: 4","type":"object","title":"MsgRecoverMorseAccount is used to:","properties":{"authority":{"description":"The bech32-encoded address of the migration module authority account (\"gov\" module address by default).\nONLY the authority, or its delegates, MAY recover Morse recoverable accounts.","type":"string"},"morse_src_address":{"type":"string","title":"EITHER:\n- The hex-encoded address of the recoverable Morse account whose stake(s) and/or balance(s) will be recovered.\n  This address MAY be invalid but NEVER empty.\n  E.g.: 00f9900606fa3d5c9179fc0c8513078a53a2073e\n- The name of a Morse module account whose balance will be recovered.\n  E.g. \"dao\" or \"fee-collector\""},"shannon_dest_address":{"description":"The bech32-encoded address of the Shannon account to which the Morse account's stake(s) and/or\nbalance(s) will be minted (recovered) as liquid Shannon tokens.","type":"string"}}}}},"description":"- Execute a one-time minting of tokens on Shannon based on tokens owned by the given Morse account\n- Credit the minted tokens to the balance of the given Shannon account\n- Migrate unclaimable staked and liquid Morse tokens as liquid Shannon tokens\n\n- MAY ONLY be executed by the authority\n- ONLY intended for use on accounts with invalid addresses and/or known lost private keys\n\nNext free index: 4","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
